summary: This bill, the Protect Our Farmers and Families Act of 2025, aims to cancel the registration of all uses of the pesticide diquat due to its potential unreasonable adverse effects on the environment. It mandates the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to cancel diquat's registration, revoke any food tolerances or exemptions, and prohibit the sale and use of existing diquat stocks. Furthermore, it prevents the EPA from reregistering diquat.
